RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Williamson County Sheriff's Office video: Williamson County Sheriff's Office video recording

RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the flatbed trailer: the flatbed trailer towed by the 2008 Chevrolet truck

RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the bed: the bed of the 2008 Chevrolet truck

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Williamson County Sheriff's Office video: Video evidence submitted at the hearing
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the 2008 Chevrolet truck driven by Feder: Vehicle driven by Federico Saldana on the day of the stop and search, with license plate registered in San Antonio on July 31, 2014, to Daniel A. Huerta, outfitted with over-sized tires and after-market rims, involved in a traffic stop due to unsafe driving
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the flatbed trailer towed by the 2008 Ch: Trailer towed by the vehicle driven by Federico Saldana, with license plate issued in Laredo on November 20, 2014, to Daniel Martin Huerta, nearly involved in two collisions during the incident
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Josiah Bennett's patrol car: Vehicle used by Josiah Bennett, part of the Williamson County Sheriff's Office, where the K-9 dog was put after searching the 2008 Chevrolet truck and flatbed trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the cab of the 2008 Chevrolet truck: The front section of the vehicle driven by Federico Saldana, searched by the K-9 unit
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the bed of the 2008 Chevrolet truck: The rear section of the vehicle driven by Federico Saldana, searched by the K-9 unit
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.K-9 dog used for searching: Dog used for searching the 2008 Chevrolet truck and flatbed trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.computer used by Williamson County Sheri: Computer used to run checks on driver's license and registration during a valid traffic stop, also used to investigate whether the driver has any outstanding warrants and if the vehicle is stolen
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Deputy Jason Cox's patrol video recordin: Video evidence submitted as Exhibit 1, containing three separate but consecutive clips of the events in question, with audio component used to clarify statements made by Federico Saldana
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.DVD containing Deputy Jason Cox's patrol: Digital storage medium containing the patrol video recording
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.audio from Deputy Jason Cox's patrol vid: Audio component of the patrol video recording used to clarify statements made by Federico Saldana, including the name of the vehicle's owner
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.driver's license of Federico Saldana: License examined by Williamson County Sheriff's Office officer during traffic stop, used to verify identity
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.vehicle registration of the 2008 Chevrol: Registration checked by Williamson County Sheriff's Office officer during traffic stop, confirming vehicle ownership
